channel.title: Edge Trades?
channel.description: Everyone on the Rs forums are saying NO TRADES IN EDGE, is there a scam you can do in edgeville or something? Please tell me it if there is:) :) :)

item.title: Edge Trades?
item.dc:creator: @james james
item.description:
@james wrote:

Yeh they are in the wilderness, they usually have somebody a higher combat level than you. then we you trade them a pure comes and pwns you with freezing spells/entangles whatever. Some guy tried to do it to me here is the excact convo as i remember it
Scammer:hey dude i will buy all your s!!!
Me: Ok i got 5k s so that 1.5m right?
Scammer:yeh ok meet me at edgy bank k? my world…
Me:yeh ok
logs out
logs in
teles to edgy with glory
Me:dude your not in the bank where are you.
scammer:im east of the bridge near edgy u come?
Me:gets suspicious oh ok i will come puts all s and items into bank
scammer:ty dude i really need this fletching level
scammer:can you hurry up my mom is screaming at me and i need this fletching level.
me:sure ok
sees scammer in wildy fletching logs
trades scammer
level 89 comes flying out of the wild and attaks me ( im lvl 90)
the scammer who was lvl 113 says. Haha newb u got ownt!!!
me:haha newb! i didnt bring the s w00t
wakes up in fally

Read full topic

item.title: Edge Trades?
item.dc:creator: @Loz Loz
item.description:
@Loz wrote:

Yeah… something like taking your characters to the wild and letting one kill the other to transfer items.
